name: DOD: Survivor Benefit Plan
description: Offers up to 55% of a service member's retired pay for survivors of active duty service members and some retired and reserve members.
fullDescription: Offers up to 55% of a service member's retired pay for survivors of active duty service members and some retired and reserve members.
whatTheyOffer: Provides support for qualified spouses, children, and other family members of deceased service members.
howToGetIt:
Eligibility requirements:
- The deceased served in the active military
- The service status of the deceased is: active-duty service member, retired from the service, or member of the National Guard/Reserves
- One of the following applies to the deceased: died while on active duty or died while on inactive-duty service training
- The applicantâ€™s relationship to the deceased is: spouse or child
